name: AntiDon't
description:
Submitted for the GMTK Jam 2020 "Out of Control"

  • SYNOPSIS

Marshmallow has a slight problem. They've been infected with a disease that makes them continually grow over time. It goes by many names: "The curse of the ages", "growing pains" or....puberty....? Regardless, Marshmallow needs to find a cure! Unfortunately, the disease is so volatile that the antidote keeps changing every 17 seconds! Will Marshmallow ever find the antidote? Or will it just be an AntiDon't? (apologies for the bad pun).

  • HOW IT RELATES TO THEME

This game relates to the theme of "Out of Control" as the player character continuously grows and the "solution" to the puzzle keeps changing every 17 seconds.

  • WARNING

This game does have some build issues which is being worked on.
